pr_title: Add some tests for Java CompletableFuture

timeline.message: Add some tests for Java CompletableFuture

timeline.author: randomanderson

replies.bodyText: I forgot to remove that... thanks for the reminder.
replies.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              // Execute tests on all JVMs, even rare and outdated ones
          
          
            
              coreJavaInstrumentation = true
          
      
    
    
  

This parameter is no longer used
timeline.author: randomanderson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+// Set properties before any plugins get loaded
+ext {
+  minJavaVersionForTests = JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8
+  // Execute tests on all JVMs, even rare and outdated ones
+  coreJavaInstrumentation = true
